x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: In AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview never finishes loading
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview issue

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_2d4ce69c1bed1d10ae5b21b5ec4bcb54
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>In AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview never finishes loading</description><healthcheck_type/><name>AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview issue</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Provide update set named "CAD-Ext-Patch-Fix -v1"</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var queryString = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^versionSTARTSWITH18.^ORversionSTARTSWITH19.";
var checkVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
checkVersion.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
checkVersion.query();

//Checking if update set is installed
var updateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
updateSet.addQuery('name', 'CAD-Ext-Patch-Fix -v1');
updateSet.query();
if (updateSet.getRowCount() > 0 || checkVersion.getRowCount() < 1) {
	//skip
} else {

    util.handleOutput('If your AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview never finishes loading than reach out to Nuvolo Technical Engineering team for the update set "CAD-Ext-Patch-Fix -v1" and install it. ', 'warning', 'Cad Extension');

}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Harshal.Sonawane@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-22 12:59:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d4ce69c1bed1d10ae5b21b5ec4bcb54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoCAD Graphic Sync Preview issue</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_2d4ce69c1bed1d10ae5b21b5ec4bcb54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
